name: GoFly Academy
about: GoFly Academy is a FAA-approved Part 141 flight school based in Miami, dedicated to providing high-quality flight training. Our experienced Certified Flight Instructors offer comprehensive training for the Private Pilot License, covering aerodynamics, FAA regulations, and aircraft maneuvers. Students learn to master daytime cross-country flights in our single-engine Cessna 172 fleet. We adhere to strict FAA requirements, ensuring all students meet the necessary age, medical, and language criteria. As a family-owned and run aviation school, GoFly Academy is driven by a passion for flying and adventure, committed to making every student's learning experience positive and life-changing.
services:

Flight Instructor CFI
